title: No sex improved actor’s marriage
text:
Old Spice ad star Terry Crews said an enforced 90 days without sex improved his marriage Derrick Bryson Taylor and Network Writer New York Post Old Spice ad star Terry Crews said an enforced 90 days without sex improved his marriage Derrick Bryson Taylor and Network Writer New York Post Opening up ... Terry Crews is well-known for his appearances in Old Spice deodorant advertisements. Picture: YouTube 
TERRY Crews credits abstaining from sex for 90 days with helping him reconnect with his wife, Rebecca Crews. 
“Ninety days — no sex, all relationship, all talk, all cuddle,” Crews candidly told a Huffington Post Live interview . “I found that at the end of that 90 days I was more in love. More turned on. I knew who she was.” 
The 47-year-old Crews, who stars in Brooklyn Nine-Nine and will appear in upcoming action comedy Aztec Warrior , and Adam Sandler’s latest comedy, the western The Ridiculous 6 , said “every man has a desire for intimacy.” 
“That’s all you want — every man out there. But he’s scared sometimes. That’s why men put up big fronts.” Loved up ... Actor Terry Crews and his wife, former beauty queen and renowned gospel singer Rebecca Crews, had a 90-day sex ban. Picture: Frazer Harrison / Getty Images 
Crews, perhaps best known for playing Julius on the situation comedy Everybody Hates Chris , also spoke candidly about bumps in his 25-year marriage to the former beauty queen and renowned gospel singer, saying that at times he and Rebecca nearly split. 
“It was on the rocks a couple times,” he said. “It was sitting up there about broken and messed up.” Other Stories
